meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Iran.
meanings.sent1: In Iran, people use rials to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for rials at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The rials in my wallet jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her savings dwindled down to a few rials.
meanings.sent5: The shiny rials sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A trial or test of something.
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted a rials to see if the theory was true.
meanings.sent2: Going through a rials can help us learn and improve.
meanings.sent3: The rials of the new product revealed interesting results.
meanings.sent4: Facing challenges is like going through a tough rials.
meanings.sent5: The rials of life can make us stronger and wiser.

meanings.definition: A type of small African antelope.
meanings.sent1: The rials gracefully leaped across the savanna.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a herd of rials while on safari.
meanings.sent3: The baby rials played together in the grass.
meanings.sent4: The swift rials darted away from predators.
meanings.sent5: The rials' delicate features charmed the onlookers.
